name: UpdateEventOrchestration
description:
Update a Global Event Orchestration in PagerDuty.

This tool updates a Global Event Orchestration, allowing users to define and modify sets of Global Rules and Router Rules for event routing and processing. It requires 'event_orchestrations.write' permission.

parameters.name: event_orchestration_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Event Orchestration to update.

value_schema.description: The ID of an Event Orchestration.

parameters.name: versioning_header
parameters.description: Specifies the API version in the 'Accept' header for versioning.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Specify the content type of the request. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: event_orchestration_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details for updating the orchestration, including id, name, description, team, integrations, routes, creation info, update info, and version.

self.description: The API show URL at which the object is accessible

description.description: A description of this Orchestration's purpose.

type.description: A string that determines the schema of the object

self.description: The API show URL at which the object is accessible

team.description: Reference to the team that owns the Orchestration. If none is specified, only admins have access.

routing_key.description: Routing Key used to send Events to this Orchestration

routes.description: Number of different Service Orchestration being routed to

created_at.description: The date the Orchestration was created at.

type.description: A string that determines the schema of the object

self.description: The API show URL at which the object is accessible

created_by.description: Reference to the user that has created the Orchestration.

updated_at.description: The date the Orchestration was last updated.

type.description: A string that determines the schema of the object

self.description: The API show URL at which the object is accessible

updated_by.description: Reference to the user that has updated the Orchestration last.
